scripts.format: shopt -s extglob globstar && prettier --config ./.prettierrc.json -c --write ./src/**/*.ts* && shopt -u extglob globstar
scripts.require:firebase_webapp_configuration: [ "${FIREBASE_WEBAPP_CONFIGURATION}" ] || { echo 'FIREBASE_WEBAPP_CONFIGURATION not set (firebase config object containing web app config content, not file path)' ; exit 1 ; }
scripts.require:firestore_emulator: [ "${FIRESTORE_EMULATOR}" ] || { echo 'FIRESTORE_EMULATOR not set ('false' or local firestore address without protocol)' ; exit 1 ; }
scripts.build: npm run require:firebase_webapp_configuration && npm run require:firestore_emulator && rm -r ./dist/build && parcel build --no-cache --no-source-maps -d ./dist/build -- "$npm_package_main"
scripts.start: npm run require:firebase_webapp_configuration && npm run require:firestore_emulator && parcel serve --no-cache -d ./dist/ -p 5002 -- "$npm_package_main"
